newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan stocks soar 3.31 pct on Sharif win.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan stocks soar 3.31 pct on Sharif win.

text.p: Pakistani stocks ended 3.31 percent up on Tuesday on a buying spree fuelled by Nawaz Sharif's Pakistan Muslim League landslide election win, dealers said.
"The market has welcomed Sharif's win," dealer Shakil Anwar said. "But the index rose too fast. Now speculators will book profits."
The Karachi index rose 52.86 points to end at 1,650.12 at noon. Gainers beat losers 231 to 15. PTCL rose 2.10 rupees to 36.70 and Hub Power 1.80 to 43.20.
